name: NBA ShootOut 2003
description:
Back of Case - PlayStation (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

  • IF IT'S NOT FROM THE NBA, IT'S NOT THE NBA - Signature jams, animations, A.I. and plays from the NBA elite.
  • NBA HOOPS THE WAY IT SHOULD BE PLAYED - Run the court with Total Control: Passing, Screening & Shooting.
  • IT'S NBA. TRUE. NOW MAKE IT ALL ABOUT YOU - Customize Create Player & Create Dunk to become the next MVP.
  • GET YOUR HEAD OUT OF THE MANUAL AND IN THE GAME - Go to the hole with 18 one-touch player controls and no homework.
(screenshot captions)
  • TOUCH SHOOTING
  • SIMPLIFIED GAMEPLAY
  • SIGNATURE ANIMATIONS
  • DESIGN YOUR OWN DUNK
